data.title: Kings of Thailand
data.meta_description: Rattanakosin Kingdom and Kingdom of Thailand (1782–present) Chakri dynasty (1782–present) 1.  Phrabat Somdet Phra Ramathibodi Sri Sinthra Maha Chakri Boromanat Phra Phutthayotfa Chulalok the Great (Rama I)  Birth - 20 March 1737   Reign from - 6 April 1782    Coronation - 10 June 1782           Reign until Death - 7 September 1809 (27 years) (72 years old)…
data.text:
Rattanakosin Kingdom and Kingdom of Thailand (1782–present)

Chakri dynasty (1782–present)

1. Phrabat Somdet Phra Ramathibodi Sri Sinthra

Maha Chakri Boromanat

Phra Phutthayotfa Chulalok

the Great

(Rama I)

Birth – 20 March 1737

Reign from – 6 April 1782

Coronation – 10 June 1782

Reign until Death – 7 September 1809 (27 years) (72 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s)

– First King of Rattanakosin – Friend and Father-in-law of Taksin

2. Phrabat Somdet Phra Ramathibodi Sri Sinthra

Maha Itsarasunthon

Phra Phutthaloetla Naphalai

(Rama II)

Birth – 24 February 1767

Reign from Coronation- 7 September 1809

Reign until Death – 21 July 1824 (14 years) (57 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Son of Rama I andQueen Amarindra

3. Phrabat Somdet Phra Ramathibodi Sri Sinthra

Maha Jessadabodindra

Phra Nang Klao Chao Yu Hua

(Rama III)

(Phra Maha Jesataraj Chao)

Birth – 31 March 1788

Reign from Coronation – 21 July 1824

Reign until Death – 2 April 1851 (26 years) (63 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Son of Rama II andPrincess Consort Sri Sulalai

4. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paramenthra

Maha Mongkut

Phra Chom Klao Chao Yu Hua

(Rama IV)

Birth – 18 October 1804

Reign from – 2 April 1851

Coronation – 6 April 1851 (1st time) 15 May 1851 (2nd time)

Reign until Death – 1 October 1868 (17 years) (63 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s)

– Half-brother of Rama III – Son of Rama II andQueen Sri Suriyendra

5. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paraminthra

Maha Chulalongkorn

Phra Chulachomklao Chao Yu Hua

the Great

(Rama V)

(Phra Piya Maharaj)

Birth – 20 September 1853

Reign from – 1 October 1868

Coronation – 11 November 1868 (1st time)16 November 1873 (2nd time)

Reign until Death – 23 October 1910 (42 years) (57 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s)

– Son of Rama IV andQueen Debsirindra

– Under Regency of Grand Duke Sri Suriyavongs from 1868–1873

6. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paramenthra

Maha Vajiravudh

Phra Mongkut Klao Chao Yu Hua

(Rama VI)

(Phra Maha Dhiraraj Chao)

Birth – 1 January 1881

Reign from – 23 October 1910

Coronation – 11 November 1911

Reign until Death – 26 November 1925 (15 years) (44 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Son of Rama V and Queen Saovabha Phongsri

7. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paraminthra

Maha Prajadhipok

Phra Pok Klao Chao Yu Hua

(Rama VII)

Birth – 8 November 1893

Reign from – 26 November 1925

Coronation – 25 February 1926

Reign until – 2 March 1935 (9 years) (abdicated)

Death – 30 May 1941 (47 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s)

– Younger brother ofRama VI – Son of Rama V andQueen Saovabha Phongsri

8. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paramenthra

Maha Ananda Mahidol

Phra Atthama Ramathibodin

(Rama VIII)

Birth – 20 September 1925

Reign from – 2 March 1935

Coronation – —

Reign until Death- 9 June 1946 (12 years) (20 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Nephew of Rama VII

– Grandson of Rama V by Mahidol Adulyadej – Under Regency from 1935–1946

9. Phrabat Somdet Phra Paraminthra

Maha Bhumibol Adulyadej

Siamindradhiraj Borommanathbobitra

the Great

(Rama IX)

(Somdet Phra Phatthara Maharat)

Birth – 5 December 1927

Reign from – 9 June 1946

Coronation – 5 May 1950

Reign until Death- 13 October 2016 (70 years) (88 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Nephew of Rama VII

– Younger brother ofRama VIII – Grandson of Rama V byMahidol Adulyadej

10. Somdet Phra Chao Yu Hua

Maha Vajiralongkorn

Bodindradebayavarangkun

(Rama X)

Birth – 28 July 1952

Reign from – 13 October 2016

Coronation – TBA

Reign until Death – Present (Incumbent: 1 year, 54 days) (65 years old)

Relationship with predecessor(s) – Nephew of Rama VII
